updated_cases.title: Validate the 'SETTINGS_HEADER_TABLE_SIZE' setting
updated_cases.custom_summary:
1. Configure the Client to send "SETTINGS_HEADER_TABLE_SIZE" setting in Settings Frame.
2. Make a H2 Connection to the server.
updated_cases.custom_expected: The initial value is 4,096 octets. This setting allows the sender to inform the remote endpoint of the maximum size of the compression table used to decode field blocks, in units of octets. The encoder can select any size equal to or less than this value by using signaling specific to the compression format inside a field block.

updated_cases.title: Validate the lower 'SETTINGS_HEADER_TABLE_SIZE' setting to 1024
updated_cases.custom_summary:
1. Configure the Client to send "SETTINGS_HEADER_TABLE_SIZE" setting with 1024 in Settings Frame.
2. Make a H2 Connection to the server.
updated_cases.custom_expected: the proxy should read the "SETTINGS_HEADER_TABLE_SIZE" from client and use same setting for connection between Proxy and server.

updated_cases.title: Validate H2 Request with "Enable Push" Flag is enabled
updated_cases.custom_summary:
1. Configure the Client with 'Enable Push' is set to 1.
2. Enable "Push_Promise" and configure in Server.
3. Make an H2 Request from client via nsproxy.
updated_cases.custom_steps: Not supported by Proxy, Proxy set 'Enable_push" to 0 to server
updated_cases.custom_expected:
1. Proxy should should split the connection into two connections. and maintain a connection b/w client <--> proxy and another b/w proxy <--> server using Http2.
2. Proxy should read the settings from client and use same setting for connection between proxy and server.
3. server should the "PUSH_PROMISE" Frame to client.
4. when Proxy receives the Frame, it should forward that to client using connection b/w client and proxy.

updated_cases.title: Validate H2 Request with "Enable Push" Flag is disabled
updated_cases.custom_summary:
1. Configure the Client with 'Enable Push' is set to 0.
2. Enable "Push_Promise" and configure in Server.
3. Make an H2 Request from client via nsproxy.
updated_cases.custom_expected:
1. Proxy should should split the connection into two connections. and maintain a connection b/w client <--> proxy and another b/w proxy <--> server using Http2.
2. Proxy should read the settings from client and use same setting for connection between proxy and server.
3. Though the server is enabled with Push_Promise setting.since the client disabled the "Enable_Push", the server should honor it and shouldn't send "Push_Promise" Frame.

updated_cases.title: Validate 'INITIAL_WINDOW_SIZE' setting with Default value in Settings Frame.
updated_cases.custom_summary: 1. Make H2 Connection with default settings to server via proxy.
updated_cases.custom_expected:
1. Proxy should should split the connection into two connections. and maintain a connection b/w client <--> proxy and another b/w proxy <--> server using Http2.
2. the Proxy should use client's "INITIAL_WINDOW_SIZE" setting for connection b/w proxy and server".
3. in this case the default 'INITIAL_WINDOW_SIZE" is 65535.

updated_cases.title: Validate 'MAX_FRAME_SIZE' setting with Default value in Settings Frame.
updated_cases.custom_summary: 1. Make H2 Connection with default settings to server via proxy.
updated_cases.custom_expected:
1. Proxy should should split the connection into two connections. and maintain a connection b/w client <--> proxy and another b/w proxy <--> server using Http2.
2. the Proxy should use client's "MAX_FRAME_SIZE" setting for connection b/w proxy and server".
3. in this case the default 'MAX_FRAME_SIZE" is 16384.

updated_cases.title: Validate 'MAX_FRAME_SIZE' setting with Max(16777215) value in Settings Frame.
updated_cases.custom_summary:
1. configure H2 Client with "MAX_FRAME_SIZE" set to max- 16777215.
2. Make H2 GET Request for Resource of file size 10gb from server.
updated_cases.custom_expected:
1. Proxy should should split the connection into two connections. and maintain a connection b/w client <--> proxy and another b/w proxy <--> server using Http2.
2. the Proxy should use client's "MAX_FRAME_SIZE" setting(2147483647) for connection b/w proxy and server".

updated_cases.title: Validate 'MAX_HEADER_LIST_SIZE' with initial Value set to 65535
updated_cases.custom_summary:
1. configure H2 Client with "MAX_HEADER_LIST_SIZE" set 65535
2. Make H2 GET Request for Resource of file size 100mb from server.
updated_cases.custom_expected:
1. Proxy should should split the connection into two connections. and maintain a connection b/w client <--> proxy and another b/w proxy <--> server using Http2.
2. the Proxy should use client's "MAX_HEADER_LIST_SIZE" setting for connection b/w proxy and server".

This advisory setting informs a peer of the maximum field section size that the sender is prepared to accept, in units of octets. The value is based on the uncompressed size of field lines, including the length of the name and value in units of octets plus an overhead of 32 octets for each field line.
For any given request, a lower limit than what is advertised MAY be enforced. The initial value of this setting is unlimited.

updated_cases.title: Validate the 'Headers' Frame with default settings
updated_cases.custom_summary:
1. Configure H2 Server with MAX_FRAME_SIZE set to default(16384).
2. Make a H2 GET Request for Resource with default Headers.
3. make sure the Header Frame can fit into 1 Frame.
updated_cases.custom_expected:
1. Proxy should should split the connection into two connections. and maintain a connection b/w client <--> proxy and another b/w proxy <--> server using Http2.
2. the Proxy should use server's "MAX_FRAME_SIZE" setting for connection b/w proxy and client".

updated_cases.title: Validate the 'Headers' Frame with large Header block > 16384 bytes
updated_cases.custom_summary:
1. Configure H2 Server with MAX_FRAME_SIZE set to default(16384).
2. Make a H2 GET Request for Resource with Header Block length 32768.
updated_cases.custom_expected:
1. Proxy should should split the connection into two connections. and maintain a connection b/w client <--> proxy and another b/w proxy <--> server using Http2.
2. the Proxy should use server's "MAX_FRAME_SIZE" setting for connection b/w proxy and client".
3. A field block that does not fit within a HEADERS frame is continued in a CONTINUATION frame.
4. Request should be successful.
